gameDetails.name: Champions of Midgard: Valhalla â€“ Dark Vordr Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
The Dark Vordr Monster promo card for Champions of Midgard. Its effect reads as followed:
Game End: Gain 1 Glory per die alive at game end.

As this is an Epic Monster, you can only use it if playing with the Valhalla expansion.

Available as part of the 2020 Dice Tower Kickstarter Discoverers Pack.
